message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500.  It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget.

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $10,500 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further to $11,000.  This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,750. Can we make a deal at this price?
